title: Business Analyst
description:
Company Description

Sandhu Hydraulic is a manufacturer of hydraulic machine sheet bending machine sheet shering machine, iron worker, cutting and punching machine

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a Business Analyst at Sandhu Hydraulic located in Jalalabad. The Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing business processes, gathering and documenting business requirements, and communicating effectively with stakeholders.

Qualifications


Analytical Skills and Business Analysis
Communication Skills
Experience in Business Process and Business Requirements
Problem-solving abilities
Attention to detail
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field
Show more
